photomacros.dataset module¶

photomacros.dataset.main(input_dir=PosixPath('/Users/allan/Documents/GitHub/data/raw/food101/images'), output_dir=PosixPath('/Users/allan/Documents/GitHub/data/processed'))[source]¶

Process all .jpg images from the input directory and save to the output directory.

Parameters:

  • input_dir (Path) – Directory containing raw images. Defaults to RAW_DATA_DIR / “food101/images”.

  • output_dir (Path) – Directory to save processed images. Defaults to PROCESSED_DATA_DIR.

Return type:

None
